txt.en: 'My duty is to bring in food for all the people of the Blue Mountains, and I perform it proudly.'
'My brother is fighting the goblins along the southern road. It is dangerous work.'
'I once brought down a mighty aurochs not far from here. The people of Gondamon ate well that month.'
'The way-station of Noglond is to the west. I hear they have had some trouble with brigands of late.'
